body.name: Doll - Add Water & See Who Grows
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 28 mins
features: Just Add Water And Like Magic, A New Friend Will Blume Before Your Eyes!
Each Blume Doll Features Over-The-Top Fashion Hairstyles And Outfits That You Can Mix And Match.
Discover 10+ Surprises Including A Mini Friend, Sticker Sheet, And Fashion Accessories.
body.description: A little bit of water reveals a whole lot of magic in the outrageous world of Blume! Anything but ordinary, Blume dolls come hidden inside flower pots just waiting to be discovered they need is you! Best of all, who you grow and what’s inside is a total surprise! Each Blume doll features unique, over-the-top hairstyles and outfits that can be interchanged with other dolls. The flower pot comes packed with 10+ surprises that include fashion shoes, a sticker sheet, and a mini friend, as well as a secret playset. Who will you Blume? Collect all 22 Blume dolls to mix and match hairstyles and outfits and build out your world!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WHO WILL YOU BLUME? All it takes is a little water... ...for your new friend to magically grow! Is she rare or super-rare? You won't know until you meet her!
PERSONALITY THAT’S OUT OF THIS WORLD! Each Blume Doll's signature style is defined by her choice of clothes and choice of friends.
10 SURPRISES HIDDEN INSIDE! PLAYSET IN EVERY POT MIX & MATCH FASHIONS MORE SURPRISES!
COLLECT ALL 22! The stylish possibilities are endless and their outrageous hairstyles are interchangeable too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: "The Blume Doll has become an absolute favorite in our household. It's a captivating toy that offers an element of wonder and excitement for kids. The concept of adding water to reveal the doll inside the flowerpot is both unique and engaging. It fosters creativity and imaginative play as children eagerly anticipate the surprise. Watching my child's face light up when the doll 'blooms' is truly heartwarming. It's a simple yet incredibly effective way to provide hours of entertainment while sparking their imagination. This toy is a wonderful addition to any child's collection.""What sets the Blume Doll apart is its ability to offer not just a toy but an experience. It's not about flashy gimmicks or complicated features; it's about the joy of discovery and the sheer delight it brings. The element of surprise is a fantastic way to keep kids entertained and engaged. The doll's design is adorable, and the process of 'growing' the doll adds an extra layer of excitement. Whether for gifting or simply bringing joy to your child, the Blume Doll is a fantastic choice.""In today's world of digital distractions, it's refreshing to find a toy like the Blume Doll that encourages hands-on play and sparks a child's imagination. It's simple, engaging, and offers endless entertainment. Plus, it's an excellent way for parents and kids to bond as they discover the surprise together. I highly recommend the Blume Doll as a delightful addition to any child's toy collection. It's a source of pure joy and imaginative exploration."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The birthday girl was thrilled
reviews.reviewText: It made for a fun birthday gift. The 6 year old recipient was very happy. I did not get to see it "grow" out of the packaging This is a cute gift idea.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute well worth the cost and easy to create.
reviews.reviewText: I wish I would’ve found these earlier for years now I’ve been buying all those tiny little dolls I won’t mention which ones they’re not actually really dolls but little tiny figurines that my granddaughter has loved she is seven years old now and I actually bought this for my four-year-old Granddaughter and I send it here instead of her house so I had this one and I gave it to my granddaughter which is down the street and she’s so into all these other things these days but she still loves dolls and this one she loved and she does great tutorials I wish I would’ve recorded her opening it up because she does such a great job she did it since she was little she Would describe everything she opened she read instructions directions and it was so cute she’s been doing it like I say since she was little ... and this would’ve been a perfect one for me to record so maybe I can get her to do it next time this is adorable and it’s well worth the money you can’t find anything this cute for the money so I highly recommend it I ended up buying a few for my two-year-old little niece loved it four-year-old great granddaughter and even between acting classes she opened it up .. what fun in these times and not seeing my Grandchildren but on FaceTime I love sending them things and I had ran out of stuff to send them and parents said no more big stuff so wala perfect 👏👍 Thanku

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So adorable! So fun! Love it!
reviews.reviewText: Just as described and so cute!! The only gripe I have is that the instructions were nowhere? We followed the 1,2,3 pics but it was a little confusing! We loved the toy- worth the price! Doll smells very spray painted so a little worried about that when kids play and chew on the toy?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Granddaughter loved, watching it, grows/pop-up
reviews.reviewText: Great little toy! Add water with a little watering can provided and you get a watch it pop up/grow and get your little doll.I will be getting the other granddaughters each one when we see them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hermosassss me encantaron
reviews.reviewText: Tienen un mecanismo muy lindo para crecer. Nos encantaron

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very cute packaging & my granddaughter was excited to get it. However, hair" broke away from body within an hour

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughter had been talking about these and I had absolutely no clue what they were. I ordered it anyways and she was so excited when it came. She told me we were going to water it and a fairy would grow, but i wasn't exactly convinced thats how it would work. But, thats exactly how it worked! I was geeked to see how it worked and had to stop myself from getting another one just to do it again. A fun toy with a neat reveal for fairly cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Came in good condition,nice quality it also smells a little bit like chocolate also it had really cute clothes and accessories.

First of all, it is so difficult to open and close the base holder. When it is made for small kids, it should be possible for them to open and close on their own without help from an adult. My daughter is 8 years old but she could not do it on her own.The crystal hair haves pores in them, a lot of flash along the parting line which makes it look like low quality product and not worth the money being paid for.The doll would not wait inside the paper seal after the main seal was removed. Even before my daughter could pour water on it, the doll emerged outside spoiling the whole idea of a blooming doll.The doll neither stands on its own nor on the stand provided for that purpose. It keeps falling again and again. It is such a difficult effort to find the center of gravity to make it stand for even a few moments.I would never buy this again.

reviews.reviewTitle: Tochter sagt: „Super Hammer!“ Ist eine süße Idee!
reviews.reviewText: Wirklich süß. Habe meine Tochter damit überrascht. Zusammen sind wir das Projekt angegangen. Sie ist 5. Alleine hätte sie es wahrscheinlich falsch gemacht. Aber mit wenig Instruktionen konnte sie, sobald die Plastik Verpackung entfernt war, alle Schritte selber machen.Mit der kleinen Plastik Gießkanne gießt sie die Oberfläche. Diese ist aus gedruckter Pappe welche wie Erde aussieht. Durch das Wasser wird die Pape nass und weich somit kann die Puppe von unten nach oben ausbrechen. Wie eine Blume wachsen. Echt süß gemacht.War ne tolle Überraschung und meine kleine sagt jetzt es ist ihre Tochter da sie sie ja zum Leben gebracht hat. 😂Zubehör ist ein wenig dabei aber eher mager. Schade ist dass nachdem die Puppe „geschlüpft“ ist man eigentlich mit dem Töpfchen nichts mehr machen kann. Meine kleine spielt zwar damit aber die Puppe passt nicht mehr rein.Schöner wäre gewesen ein fester Deckel und die Vase etwas größer.Ich fand für 7,99 auf jedenfall ein gutes Preis-leistungsverhältnis.Ich werde es auf jedenfall wieder kaufen, meine Tochter wünscht sich alle Figuren. Sind toll zum sammeln. Gibt auch verschiedene Looks und die Haare können getauscht werden. In allem echt gut.Hoffe meine Rezession hat euch geholfen. Wenn ja Ihr kennt das Spiel. Freue mich auf den Klick und das Feedback.Viel Spaß !
